title: Business Practical Skill Enhancement: Building Explainable AI Models for Predicting Traffic Accident Severity

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Development of a model classifying severity of fatalities/injuries/property damage into three levels using a multi-task deep learning framework
Extraction and visualization of core risk factors from prediction results by applying Layer-wise Relevance Propagation (LRP) techniques

Within one week, learners can identify three traffic accident risk factors in corporate field settings (e.g., warehouses, construction sites), establish one prevention strategy using an AI model (e.g., Vision AI), and write an interpretation report of approximately 500 characters.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
